title: Schedule test suite collection execution on remotely in Katalon Studio
description: You can schedule a test suite collection execution on multiple servers with Katalon TestOps. To learn more about planning and monitoring all test activities in Katalon TestOps, you can refer to this document here: Schedule Test Runs in TestOps.
